scripts.generate:mochawesome-report: npx shx mkdir -p cypress/results/combined && npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" | tee cypress/results/combined/combined-report.json && npx marge cypress/results/combined/combined-report.json --reportDir cypress/results/combined --reportFilename combined-report
scripts.copy:report: npm run clean:docs && npx shx mkdir -p docs && npx shx cp cypress/results/combined/combined-report.html docs/index.html && echo '' > docs/.nojekyll
scripts.run:with-report: npm run clean:reports && npm run test:mocha && npm run generate:mochawesome-report && npm run copy:report && npm run deploy:reports
